summary.span: Implements using a singly linked list.

span.span: Implements using a singly linked list.

summary.span: Recommended for collections that typically include fewer than 10 items.

span.span: Recommended for collections that typically include fewer than 10 items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个简单的实现使用单向链表。This is a simple implementation of using a singly linked list. 很小，并且比快如果的元素数为 10 或更小。It is smaller and faster than a if the number of elements is 10 or less. 此值不应如果性能很重要为大量元素使用。This should not be used if performance is important for large numbers of elements. 中的项不在任何保证顺序; 代码不应依赖于当前的顺序。Items in a are not in any guaranteed order; code should not depend on the current order. 为实现快速键控检索; 项内部的实际顺序取决于实现，并且无法更改在将来版本的产品。The is implemented for fast keyed retrieval; the actual internal order of items is implementation-dependent and could change in future versions of the product. 成员，如， ， ，和是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。Members, such as , , , and are O(`n`) operations, where `n` is . 密钥不能为`null`，但值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回集合中的元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于每个元素的是一个键/值对，元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是。Instead, the element type is . 例如：For example: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#3)] `foreach`语句是枚举数，仅允许从，不写入集合读取周围的包装器。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/listdictionary.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/listdictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/listdictionary.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的所有键必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是密钥的实现。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的所有键必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是密钥的实现。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自定义比较器使这种情况下为执行使用不区分大小写的字符串的查找。The custom comparer enables such scenarios as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有其状态和其哈希代码值之间没有关联的对象通常不应作为键。An object that has no correlation between its state and its hash code value should typically not be used as the key. 例如，字符串对象作为键要优于使用 StringBuilder 对象。For example, String objects are better than StringBuilder objects for use as keys. 你还可以使用中不存在要添加新元素的键的值设置属性; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果指定的键已存在于，则设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到和从其中移除元素。The following code example adds to and removes elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/listdictionary_addremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CS/listdictionary_addremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/VB/listdictionary_addremove.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象和方法`key`以确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `key` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定和方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码中的某个元素的示例搜索。The following code example searches for an element in a . summary.span: Returns an that iterates through the .

span.span: Returns an that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is synchronized (thread safe).
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现属性因为它必需的接口。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

value.span: 如果未找到指定的键，尝试获取它将返回，并尝试将其设置创建一个使用指定的键的新条目。

span.span: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns , and attempting to set it creates a new entry using the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 你还可以使用中不存在要添加新元素的键的值设置属性; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果指定的键已存在于，则设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 密钥不能为`null`，但值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 来区分`null`返回因为找不到指定的键和`null`返回指定键的值是因为`null`，使用方法来确定在列表中是否存在的项。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the list. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的顺序未指定，但它是中的关联值顺序相同返回方法。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the method. 返回不是静态的副本; 相反，引用回原始中的键。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，更改为继续才会反映在。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不具有指定键，包含的元素保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加到和从其中移除元素。The following code example adds to and removes elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/listdictionary_addremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/CS/listdictionary_addremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_AddRemove/VB/listdictionary_addremove.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() cil managed
Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

summary.span: Returns an that iterates through the .

span.span: Returns an that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/listdictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/CS/listdictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.ListDictionary_Enumerator/VB/listdictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]
